text: Min 'Ajli Dhalika Katabna `Ala Bani 'Isra'ila 'Annahu Man Qatala Nafsaan Bighayri Nafsin 'Aw Fasadin Fi Al-'Arđi Faka'annama Qatala An-Nasa Jami`aan Wa Man 'Ahyaha Faka'annama 'Ahya An-Nasa Jami`aan Wa Laqad Ja'at/hum Rusuluna Bil-Bayyinati Thumma 'Inna Kathiraan Minhum Ba`da Dhalika Fi Al-'Arđi Lamusrifuna
